Source code for havoc.autoval.e2e_tests.test_openbmc_restapi.test_restapi

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
import json



[docs]class RestTest(TestBase):

    def _setup_execute(self):
        self.test_control["oob_mode"] = "rest"
        super(RestTest, self)._setup_execute()


[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.test_get_resources()



[docs]    def json_validator(self, data):
        if json.loads(data):
            return True
        else:
            return False



[docs]    def test_get_resources(self):
        self.validate_non_empty_list(
            self.host.oob.get_resources(), "Check resources list"
        )
        self.validate_non_empty_list(
            self.host.oob.log_util_all_options(), "Check logs list"
        )

        #to validate the restapi - sensor_data, first create a list
        #from the dictionary of dictionaries and validate for empty list
        sensors_keys = list(self.host.oob.sensor_data().keys())
        self.validate_non_empty_list(sensors_keys, "Check sensors keys list")

        self.host.oob.validate_vboot_util()

        self.validate_non_empty_list(
            self.host.oob.get_openbmc_previous_ver_list(), "Check bmcver list"
        )
        #get mem_usage dict from openbmc restapi
        #check if the dict mem_usage has 5 key-value pairs
        mem_usage = len(list(self.host.oob.get_memory_usage()))
        self.validate_equal(mem_usage, 5, "Check for memory usage dict length")

        #get available memory space from openbmc restapi
        #validate for float
        free_space = str(self.host.oob.get_available_space())
        self.validate_condition(free_space, "Check free_space str")

        #get mac from openbmc restapi
        #validate for non-empty str
        mac = self.host.oob.get_openbmc_mac()
        self.validate_condition(mac, "Check BMC MAC str")

        #get hw-enforce from openbmc restapi
        #validate for non-empty str
        hw_enforce = self.host.oob.is_hardware_enforce()
        self.validate_condition(hw_enforce, "Check BMC HW Enforce")



if __name__ == '__main__':
    test = RestTest()
    test.lifecycle()
